# FoodFinder Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Create React + Node.js project structure
- [x] Customize the Project - Add map components and filtering
- [x] Install Required Extensions - None required
- [x] Install Node.js and npm
- [x] Compile the Project - Install dependencies with `npm run install-all`
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Set up development server task
- [ ] **NEXT STEP**: Launch the Project - Start development servers with `npm run dev`
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Create README

## Project Notes
- Using React for frontend with Leaflet for free maps (alternative to Google Maps)
- Node.js/Express backend for future API endpoints
- Starting with sample data, can integrate real APIs later

## Installation Required
**Node.js is not installed on this system.** To continue:
1. Download and install Node.js from https://nodejs.org (LTS version recommended)
2. Restart VS Code
3. Run `npm run install-all` to install all dependencies
4. Run `npm run dev` to start the application
